statements: UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET trading_decision = 'Buy', post_content = 'Exciting news!' WHERE post_id = '98765432-11aa-bb22-cc33-dd4455667788';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, trading_decision = 'Buy' WHERE post_id = 'a4b7de40-1f5b-4c3d-8e9a-983a22049c2f';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET post_content = 'Exciting news about the company!', post_date = '2022-03-15 09:30:00', trading_decision = 'Sell' WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE post_id = 1234;
UPDATE TradingDecisions SET decision_reason = 'Market volatility' WHERE decision_id = 5678;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_text='New post text', sentiment_score=4.5 WHERE post_id=100
UPDATE TradingDecisions SET decision_reason='Market analysis' WHERE decision_id=200, trade_date='2023-10-15'
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_likes = 100 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE trading_decisions SET confidence_score = 0.75, buy_or_sell = 'sell' WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_text = 'Updated post text', post_likes = 100 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE trading_decisions SET confidence_score = 0.8, buy_or_sell = 'BUY' WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 500 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET sentiment_score = 0.75, post_content = 'Updated Post Content' WHERE post_id = 201;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 1500, join_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis_records SET sentiment_strength = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE record_id = 10;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET follower_count = 1000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET follower_count = 1000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = likes_count + 1, post_date = '2022-10-20 08:00:00' WHERE post_id = 5;
